txt.en: Trees for harvesting lumber can be found in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should collect cuts of lumber.
Collect cuts of lumber from the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A storage crate can be found in either Trader's Wharf or Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should place the cuts of lumber in a storage crate.
Place the cuts of lumber in a storage crate
Collected cuts of lumber from the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Someone has posted a task to collect lumber in the Wildwood.
The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Needed: Lumber from the Wildwood for building and repairing purposes. You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
